operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO message_boxes (user_id, message_box_type, message_id, pts, created_at) VALUES (:user_id, :message_box_type, :message_id, :pts, :created_at)

operation.name: SelectLastPts
operation.sql: SELECT pts FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id ORDER BY pts DESC LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectPtsByGTMessageID
operation.sql: SELECT pts FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND message_id > :message_id ORDER BY pts
